content: मुंड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मुंड्-घञ्] {@--1@} Shaved, bald. {@--2@} Lopped, stripped of top-leaves. {@--3@} Blunt, pointless. {@--4@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Hornless. {@--5@} Low, mean. --डः {@--1@} A man with a shaved or bald head. {@--2@} A bald or shaven head. {@--3@} The forehead. {@--4@} A barber. {@--5@} The trunk of a tree stripped of its top-branches. {@--6@} An epithet of Rāhu. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> <ab>N.</ab> of a people. --डा {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (मुंडीरिका). {@--2@} Bengal madder. {@--3@} A female mendicant of a particular order. --डं {@--1@} The head. {@--2@} Myrrh. {@--3@} Iron.
